article_text:
If you drive by 66th and Hough St. in Cleveland, you'll find yourself in a the midst of an urban vineyard. And that's not all. One man is helping transform the neighborhood through innovative urban agriculture, and our QUEST Science team went to check it out. Anne Glausser brings us this audio postcard.

Keep your eyes peeled for the finished biocellar in Cleveland's Hough neighborhood later this summer. As for the wine, Frazier says stay tuned for updates about when it'll be available for purchase.

article_metadata.description: In the Hough neighborhood of Cleveland, new developments are brewing in urban agriculture, including an urban vineyard and the world's first "biocellar."

og.title: Cleveland's Urban Vineyard and Biocellar

article_summary:
Keep your eyes peeled for the finished biocellar in Cleveland's Hough neighborhood later this summer.
If you drive by 66th and Hough St. in Cleveland, you'll find yourself in a the midst of an urban vineyard.
One man is helping transform the neighborhood through innovative urban agriculture, and our QUEST Science team went to check it out.
As for the wine, Frazier says stay tuned for updates about when it'll be available for purchase.
Anne Glausser brings us this audio postcard.
